purpose: The email announces an open postdoctoral research position in model-driven engineering at Johannes Kepler University Linz, Austria.
evidence_sentences: Open Positions for POST-DOCTORAL RESEARCHER in MODEL-DRIVEN ENGINEERING at the Johannes Kepler University Linz, Austria.
We are seeking a postdoctoral researcher to explore model-driven, structured engineering.
Duration and Salary: The selected candidate will be appointed to a full-time position with an initial term of 3-4 years.
Applications, including a detailed curriculum vitae (in English), should be sent to Prof. Alexander Egyed.
